author: kkolinko
msg: Specify explicit encoding when performing filtering in copy and replace tasks

author: bdelacretaz
msg: SLING-905 - testBundleDependencies added, checks that bundle installs are retried

author: andreas
msg: Reverting change: Added support for meta data index types. Requires Java 1.5, will be postponed.

author: tomwhite
msg: MAPREDUCE-674. Sqoop should allow a "where" clause to avoid having to export entire tables. Contributed by Kevin Weil.

author: kkolinko
msg: * Specify explicit encoding, instead of using the platform default one
* Don't add blank lines to files
* Added **/*.rtf to the list of exclusions and sorted it alphabetically.
Note, that fixlast option for fixcrlf task is since Ant 1.6.1 only.
